item.title: Bypassing Chrome’s Anti-XSS Filter，绕过谷歌浏览器 XSS 过滤器
item.description: Hi! Just wanted to share my finding. I’ve found a way to bypass Chrome’s anti-xss filter. This bypass is universal, and it defeats Chrome’s XSSAuditor in all cases!
